wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 227]] is published.
==March==
* '''[[21 March|21]]''' - Filming begins on [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].
* '''[[21 March|21]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 2: Echoes of the Dead|Update 2: Echoes of the Dead]], the second update of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'', is released in North America.
* '''[[24 March|24]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 2: Echoes of the Dead|Update 2: Echoes of the Dead]], the second update of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'', is released in Europe.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''[[26 March|26]]''' - [http://3rdcome.org/ 3rd Conference on Middle-earth].
* '''[[26 March|26]]''' - Author [[Diana Wynne Jones]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 228]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game]]'' was released.
* '''[[29 April|29]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Double Worlds and Creative Process]]'' by [[Arne Zettersten]] was released.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien and Wales|Tolkien and Wales: Language, Literature and Identity]]'' by [[Carl Phelpstead]] was published.

==May==
* '''[[5 May|5]]''' - ''[[English and Medieval Studies Presented to J.R.R. Tolkien on the Occasion of his Seventieth Birthday]]'' is made available as a print-on-demand publication from [[HarperCollins]].
* '''[[20 May|20]] - [[22 May|22]]''' - [[Unquendor]]'s Lustrumfeest.
* '''[[21 May|21]] - [[22 May|22]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole, [[Birmingham]].
* '''[[23 May|23]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 3: Lost Legends of Eriador|Update 3: Lost Legends of Eriador]], the third update of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 8|''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 8]] is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 229]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 51]]'' is published.
==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2012]]'' is published.
* '''[[5 July|5]]''' - A revised printing of [[Parma Eldalamberon 12|''Parma Eldalamberon'' 12]] is released.
* '''[[7 July|7]]''' - [[Beowulf and the Critics|''Beowulf and the Critics'': Revised Second Edition]] is published.
* '''[[14 July|14]]-[[17 July|17]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing]] 2011.
* '''[[15 July|15]] - [[18 July|18]]''' - [[Mythcon 42]] in Albuquerque, New Mexico<!--Do the MS actually use Roman numerals?-->
* '''[[21 July|21]]''' - ''[[Light Beyond All Shadow|Light Beyond All Shadow: Religious Experience in Tolkien's Work]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 July|30]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s seminar in York.
* '''[[31 July|31]]''' - ''[[Picturing Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 230]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[11 August|11]] - [[14 August|14]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Cantea] - 4th International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in Valencia, Spain.
* '''[[24 August|24]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' is released for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC in North America.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien and the Study of His Sources]]'' is published. <!--Could be August 16, not confirmed. http://lingwe.blogspot.com/2011/05/my-book-is-moving-forward.html -->
* '''(?)''' - [[The One Ring (role-playing game)|''The One Ring'' (role-playing game)]] is released.
* '''?''' - The illustrated children's book ''[[Oliphaunt (book)|Oliphaunt]]'' is published in a new edition.

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[A Tolkien Tapestry]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' -  ''[[A Critical Companion to J.R.R. Tolkien|A Critical Companion to J.R.R. Tolkien: A Literary Reference to His Life and Works]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Holiday House)|J.R.R. Tolkien]]'', a children's book from Holiday House, was published.
* '''[[23 September|23]]-[[25 September|25]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2011]] at Lady Margaret Hall.
* '''[[27 September|27]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard]]'' is released.
* '''[[29 September|29]]''' - A new hardback edition of ''[[Mr. Bliss]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 231]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[19 October|19]]''' - Brother [[Joseph Power]] dies.
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - A revised updated single-edition version of ''[[The History of The Hobbit]]'' is published. 
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - ''[[The Art of The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - ''[[From Elvish to Klingon|From Elvish to Klingon: Exploring Invented Languages]]'' is published.

==November==
* '''[[2 November|2]]''' - ''[[The Loss and the Silence|The Loss and the Silence: Aspects of Modernism in the Works of C.S. Lewis, J.R.R. Tolkien & Charles Williams]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 232]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 52]]'' is published.
